seriesJson.title: Negro music in America
seriesJson.description: This series focuses on music created and performed by African-Americans, including folk, and jazz styles. This series is hosted by Anton Luckenbach of Carbondale, Illinois, who also gathered interviews in New Orleans for this series.

node.title: Program 39

node.title: Kansas City jazz
node.description: This program focuses on the Kansas City style of jazz.

node.title: Various spirituals
node.description: This program presents more spirituals, including a favorite of Carl Sandburg's.

node.title: Spirituals
node.description: This program focuses on the type of folk music known as spirituals.
